{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TL-WDR4310 |revision=v1.0 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date=03/2012 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=released in China |type=wireless router |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9344 |cpu1_cspeed=550 |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=FL064KIF |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5PS5162GFR |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag=yes |serial=yes,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9344 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=AR9580 |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an |wi2_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Atheros |sw_model=AR8327N |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} [http://www.right.com.cn/forum/thread-74961-1-1.html Technical data]
[http://www.chiphell.com/thread-383664-1-1.html Images]
[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=36534 TP-Link TL-WDR4310 v1.0 First steps and bootlogs - OpenWrt forums] [http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-wdr4310 On the OpenWrt wiki]
[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=156445&postdays=0&postorder=asc&start=30 Working build on the DD-WRT forums] "2050500224 Rev:1.0" is silkscreened on the board. See also the [[TP-LINK TL-WDR4300]] which shares the same hardware. This device does, however, have a different stock firmware header.
